name: Twin Body
description:
Twin Body is a metroidvania in which you explore caverns and gather body parts to progress.

However, you can only combine two body parts at the same time, so you should think about your composition ahead.

UseWASD to control the lower half of your body, and mouse to control the upper half.

Developed by @Lordinator , Graphics and level design by @rexibitt for the United Game Jam 2020 .
